description: I used the app in Kubuntu 18.04 and I love it. Unfortunately it crash in the new Kubuntu.

The only reason I'm giving 1 star is because this is an old skin for the BitPay app (which should be used instead). The only difference between the Copay and BitPay wallets (besides the skin) is the BitPay wallet supports the BitPay card. However, I would never recommend using the Copay version because it can easily be confused with scam mobile apps by the same name. "Copay" is not trademarkable and thus BitPay, Inc does not have a Copay mobile app and there have been waves of scam Copay mobile apps that show up on mobile app stores. Therefore, I would highly recommend that people stick to the more consistent BitPay wallet.
dont use this its a bitpay skin just use bitpay its self.
Me preguntaalgo sobre directorios que aún no entiendo porque lo hace cada vez q abrola app
